WorkItem.ClosedComment: Please see Prism 4.0 CTP - August 2010 at http://compositewpf.codeplex.com/releases/view/49963
WorkItem.Description:
The CHM file "Composite Application Guidance for WPF and Silverlight - May 2010" in Design Concepts/Multi-Targeting/Multi-Targeted Elements contains a passage
 
to reduce the change of using a feature 
 
should be
 
to reduce the chance of using a feature 
 
Thus "change" should be replaced with "chance".
WorkItem.Summary: [Documentation bug] typo in Multi-Targeting Design Concepts

Comments.Message: Thanks, fixed. Docs will be updated in the next release.
